languages.text: "Разве ты не должен помочь губернатору вернуть контроль над миром? Мне казалось, что поддержание порядка — первостепенная задача арбитров".
"Are you not supposed to help the governor regain control over this world? I thought that maintaining order was the foremost duty of any Arbitrator."
languages.original_text: "Разве ты не должен помочь губернатору вернуть контроль над миром? Мне казалось, что поддержание порядка — первостепенная задача арбитров".

traits.locale_text: "Are you not supposed to help the governor regain control over the world? I thought that maintaining order was the foremost duty of any Arbitrator."
"Are you not supposed to help the governor regain control over the world? I thought that maintaining order was the foremost duty of any Arbitrator."
"Are you not supposed to help the governor regain control over this world? I thought that maintaining order was the foremost duty of any Arbitrator."
"Are you not supposed to help the governor regain control over this world? I thought that maintaining order was the foremost duty of any Arbitrator."
"Are you not supposed to help the governor regain control over this world? I thought that maintaining order was the foremost duty of any Arbitrator."
"Are you not supposed to help the governor regain control over this world? I thought that maintaining order was the foremost duty of any Arbitrator."

languages.text: "Solltet Ihr nicht dem Gouverneur helfen, die Kontrolle über diesen Planeten zurückzuerlangen? Ich dachte, die Wahrung der Ordnung wäre die oberste Pflicht eines Arbitrators."
languages.original_text: "Are you not supposed to help the governor regain control over this world? I thought that maintaining order was the foremost duty of any Arbitrator."

traits.locale_text: "Solltet Ihr nicht dem Gouverneur helfen, die Kontrolle über diesen Planeten zurückzuerlangen? Ich dachte, die Wahrung der Ordnung wäre die oberste Pflicht eines Arbitrators."

languages.text: « N'êtes-vous pas censés aider le gouverneur à reprendre le contrôle de ce monde ? Je pensais que le maintien de l'ordre était le devoir suprême de tout arbitrator. »
languages.original_text: "Are you not supposed to help the governor regain control over this world? I thought that maintaining order was the foremost duty of any Arbitrator."

traits.locale_text: « N'êtes-vous pas censés aider le gouverneur à reprendre le contrôle de ce monde ? Je pensais que le maintien de l'ordre était le devoir suprême de tout arbitrator. »

languages.text: «¿No se supone que ha de ayudar al gobernador a recuperar el control de este mundo? Creía que mantener el orden era una obligación fundamental de todo Arbitrator».
languages.original_text: "Are you not supposed to help the governor regain control over this world? I thought that maintaining order was the foremost duty of any Arbitrator."

traits.locale_text: «¿No se supone que ha de ayudar al gobernador a recuperar el control de este mundo? Creía que mantener el orden era una obligación fundamental de todo Arbitrator».

languages.text: “难道你不该协助总督重新夺回这个世界的控制权吗？我认为，维持秩序是法务官的首要职责。”
languages.original_text: "Are you not supposed to help the governor regain control over this world? I thought that maintaining order was the foremost duty of any Arbitrator."

traits.locale_text: “难道你不该协助总督重新夺回这个世界的控制权吗？我认为，维持秩序是法务官的首要职责。”

languages.text: 「総督がこの惑星の支配権を取り戻す手助けをするのが、君の役目ではないのか？秩序を守ることが、アービトレイターの最優先の任務だと思ったんだけど」
languages.original_text: "Are you not supposed to help the governor regain control over this world? I thought that maintaining order was the foremost duty of any Arbitrator."

traits.locale_text: 「総督がこの惑星の支配権を取り戻す手助けをするのが、君の役目ではないのか？秩序を守ることが、アービトレイターの最優先の任務だと思ったんだけど」

languages.text: "Bu dünyanın kontrolünü tekrar eline almasında valiye yardım etmen gerekmiyor mu? Düzeni sağlamak, Yargıcıların en mühim vazifesi sanırdım."
languages.original_text: "Are you not supposed to help the governor regain control over this world? I thought that maintaining order was the foremost duty of any Arbitrator."

traits.locale_text: "Bu dünyanın kontrolünü tekrar eline almasında valiye yardım etmen gerekmiyor mu? Düzeni sağlamak, Yargıcıların en mühim vazifesi sanırdım."
